about_the_game: The Midnight Fight Express Soundtrack is filled with 47 adrenaline-pumping, face-melting tracks from composer Noisecream. With over 2+ hours of music at your disposal in both MP3 320kpbs and FLAC formats, you'll have plenty of time to get yourself amped to take on the mean streets of Midnight Fight Express.

With over 2+ hours of music at your disposal in both MP3 320kpbs and FLAC formats, you'll have plenty of time to get yourself amped to take on the mean streets of Midnight Fight Express.
